statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-6 \, x^{3} - x^{2} - 2 \, x - 5 , -6 \, x^{3} - x^{2} - 2 \, x - 5 , -4 \, x^{3} + x^{2} - 2 \, x , -2 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x , 14 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x + 15\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
